metadata.title: CVE-2014-0569 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 13.0.0.250 and 14.x and 15.xbefore 15.0.0.189 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.411 on Linux,Adobe AIR before 15.0.0.293, Adobe AIR SDK before 15.0.0.302, and Adobe AIRSDK & Compiler before 15.0.0.302 allows attackers to execute arbitrary codevia unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0569` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.411ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.411ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.411ubuntu0.14.04.1').
